Contact your doctor if you have any of these problems. He or she can adjust your medicines to prevent these side effects.",NHLBI,Restless Legs Syndrome
What is (are) Arrhythmia ?,"Espaol
                
An arrhythmia (ah-RITH-me-ah) is a problem with the rate or rhythm of the heartbeat. During an arrhythmia, the heart can beat too fast, too slow, or with an irregular rhythm.
                
A heartbeat that is too fast is called
